meanings.definition: To emphasize again or give special importance to something previously mentioned.
meanings.sent1: The teacher reemphasizes the importance of studying for the exam.
meanings.sent2: She always reemphasizes the need for teamwork in our projects.
meanings.sent3: The parrot reemphasizes the word 'hello' every time someone enters the room.
meanings.sent4: The bright red sign reemphasizes the danger of the high voltage area.
meanings.sent5: The coach reemphasizes the winning strategy before every game.

meanings.definition: To stress or highlight a point once more.
meanings.sent1: The speaker reemphasizes the importance of kindness in his speech.
meanings.sent2: The article reemphasizes the benefits of regular exercise.
meanings.sent3: The comedian reemphasizes his punchline for extra laughs.
meanings.sent4: The sunset reemphasizes the beauty of nature at the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The music reemphasizes the emotional impact of the scene in the movie.
